choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for 7 days.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, or cashews
### Assistant:

Here is a sample 7-day meal plan that meets your dietary restrictions:

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with berries and nuts (without dairy, almonds or cashews)
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens and a vinaigrette dressing (without honey or garlic)
Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted vegetables (without dairy, garlic or honey)
Snack: Apple slices with almond butter (without cashews)

Day 2:
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and tomatoes (without dairy, garlic or honey)
Lunch: Grilled turkey wrap with avocado and mixed greens (without almonds or cashews)
Dinner: Baked sweet potato topped with black beans and salsa (without dairy or honey)
Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus (without garlic)

Day 3:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt with berries and nuts (without dairy, almonds or cashews)
Lunch: Grilled shrimp salad with mixed greens and a vinaigrette dressing (without honey or garlic)
Dinner: Baked tofu with roasted vegetables (without dairy, garlic or honey)
Snack: Plain popcorn (without cashews)

Day 4:
Breakfast: Omelette with spinach and tomatoes (without dairy, almonds or cashews)
Lunch: Grilled chicken sandwich on whole wheat bread with mixed greens (without honey or garlic)
Dinner: Baked sweet potato topped with black beans and salsa (without dairy or honey)
Snack: Apple slices with almond butter (without cashews)

Day 5:
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and tomatoes (without dairy, garlic or honey)
Lunch: Grilled turkey wrap with avocado and mixed greens (without almonds or cashews)
Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted vegetables (without dairy, garlic or honey)
Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus (without almonds)

Day 6:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt with berries and nuts (without dairy, almonds or cashews)
Lunch: Grilled shrimp salad with mixed greens and a vinaigrette dressing (without honey or garlic)
Dinner: Baked tofu with roasted vegetables (without dairy, garlic or honey)
Snack: Plain popcorn (without almonds)

Day 7:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with berries and nuts (without dairy, almonds or cashews)
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens and a vinaigrette dressing (without honey or garlic)
Dinner: Baked sweet potato topped with black beans and salsa (without dairy or honey)
Snack: Apple slices with almond butter (without cashews)

Remember, this is just a sample meal plan. You can adjust the ingredients based on your preferences and dietary restrictions.
